title: 114_hr5184
content: Exemption for certain dividends paid by regulated investment companies to nonresident aliens expanded and made permanent. Expansion of exemption for interest-related dividends under section 871(k)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, including amounts from regulated investment companies and tax-exempt interest under section 103. Expansion of exemption for interest-related dividends under section 871(k)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, including amounts from regulated investment companies and tax-exempt interest under section 103. Modification of exceptions for interest described in subparagraph (E)(ii) and not in subparagraph (E)(i), (iii), or (iv). Conforming amendments made. Expansion of exemption for interest-related dividends under section 871(k)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, including amounts from regulated investment companies and tax-exempt interest under section 103. Modification of exceptions for interest described in subparagraph (E)(ii) and not in subparagraph (E)(i), (iii), or (iv). Conforming amendments made to replace terms related to interest with terms related to income. The text chunk discusses amendments to the Internal Revenue Code related to qualified income-related dividends, qualified net income, and qualified income. Amendments include replacing terms related to interest with terms related to income. The text chunk amends the Internal Revenue Code by replacing terms related to interest with terms related to income in various subparagraphs. The text chunk amends the Internal Revenue Code by replacing terms related to interest with terms related to income in various subparagraphs, effective for dividends in taxable years of regulated investment companies starting after December 31, 2015.
